page.title: 13Services/Employment:Gringley
page.content: {Post Lady:}has held job for 4yrs;she sorts & delivers letters between 6:30-8:30am; she uses a Post Office bicycle;heavy parcels are delivered by a van. {Butcher:}Mr M.Needham has owned the shop for 14yrs (it belonged to his Great Uncle for 40yrs prior to this); his supplier is in Doncaster;customers from Gringley & district;busiest day is Friday. {Post Office:}same owner since 1946;Mrs Marshall has an anti-bandit screen, foot-alarm bell and alarms on windows; her busiest day is Monday:approx.180 O.A.P.s come for their pensions;she also sells tobacco,confectionary, stationary,groceries,dairy produce, household goods and toys.
